items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Syracuse Orange
items.summary: It’s Senior Day in South Bend as the Notre Dame Fighting Irish play their final regular season home game against the Syracuse Orange. Notre Dame is ranked #9 in the nation, and is eyeing a college football playoff berth – and possibly an opening round home game as well. There are all sorts of playoff […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Hot and Cold Takes VS. The Syracuse Orange
items.summary: How’d We Do Last Week? Most Wildly Inaccurate It brings me no joy to do this (yes it does) but our friend from BC joined the party again and had a brutally bad take. Here here! Most Interesting It’s mostly the visual of Herm cocking his head to the Nard dog for me. Most Accurate […]

items.title: The College Football Playoff Committee loves Notre Dame more than the ACC
items.summary: On Tuesday night, the College Football Plaoff committee released its newest set of rankings, and the Notre Dame Fighting Irish remain as the #9 ranked team in the country. Honestly, I’m a little surprised the committee put Notre Dame at 9 and Alabama at 10. Obviously the AP Top 25 and Coaches Poll had the […]

items.title: When, where, and how to watch #9 Notre Dame VS Syracuse Orange
items.summary: Notre Dame is back home for Senior Day, and a familiar senior day foe… the Syracuse Orange. The Irish have some work to do over the next two weeks to solidify, and possibly even improve, their college football playoff position. They also have an opportunity to really help make the Heisman case for Jeremiyah Love […]

items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 12 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with two victories which covered massive spreads in a 28-7 win […]
